General.Name: Territorial’naya Generiruyushchaya Kompaniya No 14 PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No. 14 engages in the generation and supply of electricity and heat to wholesale market. The company offers thermal energy and heat to consumers in the Trans-Baikal Territory and the Republic of Buryatia. The company has 7 thermal power stations and 2 energy complexes with an installed electric power capacity of 649.57 MW and thermal capacity of 3,120.77 Gcal/h. Public Joint Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No. 14 was founded in 2004 and is based in Chita, Russia.
